title: Can't create a PBE account...
body: When iam at the Client opening screen and I click on ''Create an account'', Im always redirected to ''HTTP 404 Not Found''... Why ?

replies.body: When I try this It said that I already got an PBE account and when I confirm my username and password it said that username or password is incorrect...

That's weird, are you sure it's the correct username of the PBE account (not your live)?  If so, let our account team know in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we can help recover the correct account for you.

Its my live but in the signup it said the PBE account will be now link to my account and I did not have/was not able to create a formal PBE account of his own.

Thanks a lot for you time Porocles, really aprecciate like usual your help !

Your PBE is linked to your live account, but the username and credentials are not the same.  You should have a different username and pw for your PBE account.  I can't go details due to account privacy, so filling out that form is your best bet.

dude when im  trying to create it says click here for login in that link u linked after when im on login i m presing create new account i m chosing server pbe{WITH OTHER WORDS)and im returning to to link u lined here its cycle isnt it
i cant create a pbe account cause my browser says that page not found
What link are you using to get there?  You might have an incorrect url or region in the link, so you'll want to make sure it's going to NA too.
